1. PCG-simple (balanced) model is done
2. PCG-simple (imbalanced) model is done

Do:
1. scp the ECG dataset
2. Create the directories for ECG datasets
3. Create the ECG dataset
4. ECG-simple (balanced) model is done
5. ECG-simple (imbalanced) model is done
